actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a project for channel deepening for navigation at Gulfport Harbor, Harrison County, Miss.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake the phase I design memorandum stage of advanced engineering and design for the channel deepening for navigation project at Gulfport Harbor, Mississippi.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a project for channel deepening for navigation at Gulfport Harbor, Harrison County, Miss.
